1.12.2.0.8.7: Fixed a bug of Advanced Pump resulting in duplication of fluid.
1.12.2.0.8.6: Fixed a crash after placing MarkerPlus.
1.12.2.0.8.4: Fixed a problem where buttons in some GUIs didn't work.
1.12.2.0.8.3: Fixed a problem where magic mirror caused crush when you used in Twilight Forest or The End.
1.12.2.0.8.2: Added wrench of IC2 support and fixed many bugs in GUI.
1.12.2.0.8.1: Added IMC support. See wiki to get more information.
1.12.2.0.7.8: Changed the recipe of Advanced Pump. It gets wider range.
1.12.2.0.7.5: Made quarry with pump a little faster. Close #12.
1.12.2.0.7.2: Fixed a problem that QuarryPlus and MiningWellPlus dropped duplicate block. Close #8.
1.12.2.0.6.9: Added a new stand alone pump, "Advanced Pump"
